title: X-shaped Bar Unit with Wine Bottle Storage Glossy White
description: Complete a modern motif with the visual intrigue from this stylish bar unit. Bold in color and design, the hourglass-inspired silhouette welcomes an art deco-inspired feel. Great for a living room or transitional space, the crisp white hue sleekens and elongates. Keep all libation necessities at hand with the built-in foot bar, stemmed glassware holders, and bottle storage. This contemporary style helps to dazzle and delight.
